snippet: The student was arrested after she posted a Twitter message suggesting that a method for sending spam text messages might also be used to rally public awareness of the Tiananmen anniversary.
abstract: The student was arrested after she posted a Twitter message suggesting that a method for sending spam text messages might also be used to rally public awareness of the Tiananmen anniversary.

headline.main: Beijing Police Detain Student Over Tiananmen Tweet
